text_block_list.text: (Waaaaaaaaaaah!)

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
Haa, haa, haa…… 
Even though both of us put our all in to this battle. Even then……

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
That's just who you are. 
That's just the way things are.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Huu, huu, haa…… At the end it was just a match race…… 
But……she pulled away.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
As expected of Kraft-san. 
You really are……a child of the Tiara.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Uwaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaa!!!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: Rhein――Kraft――!!

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text:
The cherry blossoms dance at Hanshin! 
Last year's Mile Queen is back again!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Kraft-san!!

text_block_list.name: Teammates
text_block_list.text: Kraft!!

The team members jumped on to the course. 
Of course, I followed after them.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Trainer-san! King-san!
Our ace couldn't suppress her overflowing emotions anymore――
Our ace couldn't suppress her overflowing emotions anymore――

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Uwaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaan!!! 
Uwaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaan!!!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Dummy! You won didn't you?! 
You're the Uma Musume who should be the most dignified right now!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Why are you the one crying……why……!?

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text: Because……because……Uwaaaaaaaaan!!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
It was so hard, so painful, I felt powerless, 
so many times I thought it was hopeless!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I caused you so, so much trouble, 
but, even then……!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I really…… 
Really didn't want to give up!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
I really want……my shine to reach everyone. 
Uwaaaaaaaaaaaaaan!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, you can do it! You can! Of course you'll be able to! 
As long as you never let go of that one thing……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
It'll come true. It'll come true for sure. 
That's how Trainer and I were able to do it!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Since you've come to our team, there's nothing you can't do. 
There's no way……you can't…… Uuuuu……

Now the two of them were closer than ever. In this way, Rhein 
Kraft was able to obtain the victory she needed for her revival.

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text:
Congratulations! 
Congratulations, Kraft.

text_block_list.name: Daring Heart
text_block_list.text: But, this is just the beginning, right, Messiah?

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Yes. Wanting to raise the prestige of the 
Tiara is something that I……no, that we also want.

text_block_list.name: Air Messiah
text_block_list.text:
Kraft-san may be the standard bearer. 
But, we won't be far behind.

text_block_list.name: Young Uma Musume
text_block_list.text:
Onee-chan! 
Kraft-onee-chan won! She won!

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Yeah, let's run as hard as we can so 
we can run like that in the future.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
Because I'm sure that Kraft-onee-chan will 
continue sharing that brilliance with all of us.

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text: (Kraft…… We may be far apart now, but……)

text_block_list.name: Cesario
text_block_list.text:
(Let's meet again. I'll be waiting……! 
At that far away future for the Tiara!)

(No way……she won…… 
So you really can do something like that……)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(I wonder if I can do it too. 
At tomorrow's 『Oka Sho』……)

text_block_list.name: Fusaichi Pandora
text_block_list.text:
(Yeah, I can! Obviously! 
After all, I'm a genius♪)

A new path――had opened. With Rhein Kraft's revival, 
a new path could open for the Tiara. And then――

For the many Uma Musume to come, 
it was a new path for them to aim even higher.

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
Trainer-san, thank you very much! 
I'll keep working hard from now on!

text_block_list.name: Rhein Kraft
text_block_list.text:
First, the 『Victoria Mile』! 
A spring festival for the Senior class Tiara Uma Musume!
Yeah, do your best, Kraft!
Yeah, do your best, Kraft!

But that road still had no end. Rhein Kraft's path, 
as well as another Uma Musume's, had only just begun.
